subject: Re: Another mind body link for the test movewell page

full_threads.body:
Adding time for Joel's review.

(Time: 30mins)

Hi Michelle,

I hope all is well.

Awesome, we have copied across the /movewell-v2 content to /movewell
https://wolper.com.au/services/movewell

Hi Joel and Wolf,

With thanks for your assistance and patience with this MindBody business.

We are now ready to go live with the red FIND A CLASS - BOOK NOW button on the MoveWell page - https://wolper.com.au/services/movewell.

This is a big step forward for us and we'd like to thank you for your support.

Michelle.
(Time: 15mins)

Hi Michelle,

Sure, all good on this one :)
https://wolper.com.au/services/movewell-exercise-program-v2/

Hi Joel,

I'm sorry to do this to you.

Could you please revert to what we had this morning.

The code was

<!-- Mindbody Schedules widget begin -->

<div class="mindbody-widget" data-widget-type="Schedules" data-widget-id="4c17283b8de"></div>

<script async src="https://brandedweb.mindbodyonline.com/embed/widget.js"></script>

<!-- Mindbody Schedules widget end -->

The Find a class - Book Now link opened a new page and then the schedule appeared there.

Thanks Joel.

Hi Michelle,

Sure, we have hidden the "Find a class - book now" button and added the script you sent.

Let me know if this works for you?

Thanks Joel.

Can I ask for that script to be updated to:

<script src=https://widgets.mindbodyonline.com/javascripts/healcode.js type="text/javascript"></script><healcode-widget data-version="0.2" data-link-class="healcode-pricing-option-text-link" data-site-id="59640" data-mb-site-id="164448" data-service-id="11376" data-bw-identity-site="false" data-type="pricing-link" data-inner-html="Buy Now" />
(Time: 15mins)

Hi Michelle,

I hope all is well.

Sure, for the red button below, no script added to this button, it is just a link that goes through "https://wolper.com.au/find-a-class/".

The form in the find a class page uses the script below:

Hi Wolf,

We are having some trouble at the Mind Body end.

Just for peace of mind, could you please let me know which code is behind the FIND A CLASS - BOOK NOW link.

Is it:

1. <script src="https://widgets.mindbodyonline.com/javascripts/healcode.js" type="text/javascript"></script><healcode-widget data-version="0.2" data-link-class="healcode-pricing-option-text-link" data-site-id="59640" data-mb-site-id="164448" data-service-id="11376" data-bw-identity-site="false" data-type="pricing-link" data-inner-html="Buy Now" />

OR

<!-- Mindbody Schedules widget begin -->

<div class="mindbody-widget" data-widget-type="Schedules" data-widget-id="4c17283b8de"></div>

<script async src="https://brandedweb.mindbodyonline.com/embed/widget.js"></script>

<!-- Mindbody Schedules widget end -->

Thank you and have a great day,

Michelle.
(Time: 15mins)

Hi Michelle,

I hope all is well :)

We have made updates to the page.
https://wolper.com.au/services/movewell-exercise-program-v2/

Let me know if this works for you?

Hi there,

We are getting very close.

1. Could you please remove the top 2 links - casual class and full term - and just keep the Find a Class link. Please keep the code for the full term link because will work towards using that.

2. Please change the wording to Find a Class - Book Now

3. Could you please change the colour of the button to red or something suitable to make it stand out

4. Once done could you please make these 2 light blue buttons shown here line up:

5. The light blue "Book your MoveWell class" button can be removed.

Thank you,

Michelle..
(Time: 15mins)

Hi Michelle,

Sure, confirming we have updated the page. We add a button "Find a Class - Buy now".

https://wolper.com.au/services/movewell-exercise-program-v2/
https://wolper.com.au/find-a-class/

Hi Joel,

I think we are getting close. Thank you for your assistance and patience so far.

Under the Full Term - 12 sessions link could you please put a Buy Now link. Could that link go to a new page with the Find a Class widget functionality?

Thank you,

Michelle.

Hi Michelle,

We are looking into this, here's how it looks like when paste the given code. Can you provide us a different code?

Hi Joel,

I think it should be going to a Mind Body window so people can book online - like the original 2 links.
(Time: 15mins)

Hi Michelle,

I hope all is well.

We have created the button "Buy now" on https://wolper.com.au/services/movewell-exercise-program-v2/. When clicked it will be redirected to new page https://wolper.com.au/mindbody-schedules/ with the provided widget.

Let me know if this is correct?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow
